ai-tika-s0404t26:2_1: The first section on the eleventh rule is finished.
ai-tika-s0404t26:2_3: That’s why I remember the name of this discussion.’
ai-tika-s0404t26:2_4: Then, seeing human strength, energy, and vigor, persevere with barbed words and phrases, and they found it.
ai-tika-s0404t26:2_6: Among people who come down to the workshops there are even more human beings.
ai-tika-s0404t26:2_7: This is the first, this is the best of aristocrats, brahmins, householders, or ascetics.
ai-tika-s0404t26:2_8: I claim to recollect the matter, but he claims to recollect it.
ai-tika-s0404t26:3_0: What’s the best of men is finished.
